data.title: Tenerife Job Training
data.meta_description:
Tenerife Job Training | 401 followers on LinkedIn. #travelingtolearn #learningtotravel 
"Viajar para aprender, aprender viajando"‚Äã | Tenerife Job Training work with students to provide them with quality internships programms at the best companies in the Canary Islands. Quality placements for tourism and hospitality students are offered by Tenerife Job Training, based in the south of Tenerife who has been receiving participants from Europe Mobility programms Erasmus Plus for more than 10 years now. We are part of a professional network of companies that like ies-consultimg.es, FU or Animafest Experience help interns to study in Spain and learn Spanish.
data.text:
I‚Äôm very happy that, as part of the Erasmus program, I could participate once again in this wonderful course Tenerife Job Training, which gives me the energy to work for the entire year. This intensive week of working on myself is incredibly valuable, teaching many tools for motivation, taking on new (sometimes difficult) challenges, but also for gaining perspective and relaxation. I am grateful to the Uniwersytet Ekonomiczny we Wroc≈Çawiu for the opportunity to take part in the course, the benefits of which I will reap for a long time. The effects of this transformation (which began during last year's course) are also noticed and appreciated by students. Thank you very much Uniwersytet Ekonomiczny we Wroc≈Çawiu, Boguslawa Drelich-Skulska, Iwona Przy≈Çƒôcka, Kamila Tworek ‚ò∫Ô∏è Muchas gracias Marivi Gracia, Paula Negr√≠n Hern√°ndez, Sandra Diaz y Joey - hasta pronto mis Amigos ü•∞

Bildungsurlaub Approval We are pleased to announce that we have been accredited for the BILDUNGSURLAUB project and are excited to be able to host workers of Germany at our facility!! This project will allow us to offer English and Spanish courses opportunities to those who are looking for a stimulating and charming place to stay. Our courses are approved in: Berlin, Brandenburg, Niedersachsen, Rheinland-Pfalz and Saarland. We strongly believe in promoting an inclusive community and we want to support people in achieving their aims. We look forward to opening our doors and welcoming those who wish to join us. We are available to provide further information and answer any questions, do not hesitate to contact us at: info@tenerifejobtraining.com !! #BILDUNGSURLAUB #BILDUNGSURLAUBapproval #erasmus #erasmus+
